name: ScreenShift
description:
Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019.

There's only one enemy in this game-- but he appears in every room! Except safe rooms, I guess. Pushable blocks can be 'persisted' to make them appear in every  room of their color, and 'unpersisted' to revert them to a normal object. Aura switches change the color of the room as well as any normal objects in them. Try to escape the dungeon!

Controls

  • WASD keys or arrow keys to move and push blocks
  •  Spacebar to 'persist' and 'unpersist' objects
  • R key to reset the game
